welcome:
Welcome to the P2:MM Launcher!

Press
"Start Game" to launch the mod!

Be sure to check out the Settings Menu to customize
the launcher and your play sessions!
mount_nodlc_error:
Unable to mount P2MM!
One or both of Portal 2's DLC folders
were not found! They are needed
to run/mount P2MM!
Verify the file integrity
of Portal 2 then try again...
mount_nopath_error:
Can't mount/run P2MM!
The path for Portal 2
has not been set!
game_files_no_cached_files:
There are no cached files for the mod!

The latest version of the ModFiles folder will be downloaded...
workshop_menu_info:
The Workshop Menu is for getting the change level
command to change to a certain workshop map.

Make sure you have the workshop map downloaded
first before running the command in the Portal 2 console!
workshop_link: Enter a Steam workshop map link:
workshop_map_not_found:
Could not find workshop map!
Make sure you are subscribed
to the map and have played it
at least once.
update_is-updating: The mod is now updating. Please Wait...
update_already_up_to_date: You are already up to date!
update_nolink_error:
Couldn't find the download link
please visit our github to update...
update_would_you_like_to: Would you like to update the mod files?
no_internet_error:
An internet connection is required to download the ModFiles folder for P2MM to run.

Please check your connection then try again...
launcher_had_to_reset:
Your config has reset.
This could have been caused from an update
or a broken config file.

Please check your settings!
admin_level_error_out-of-range: Admin level must be between 0 and 6
players_error_must_be_at_least_one_playe: There must be at least one player!
game_path-is-invalid:
Game path is invalid!
Check Portal2-Path in the settings!
game_path_undefined_fetch:
Game path was undefined,
automatically retrieving...
devmode_copied_from_local_repo: Copying mod files directly from src/ModFiles!
language_menu_launch_text: The Launcher Config involves everything related to the launcher
language_menu_portal2_text: The Portal 2 Config involves everything related to your Portal 2 play session
language_menu_players_text: The Players Menu allows to set addition players as admins
data_menu_info:
This menu is a WORK IN PROGRESS!
Nothing here is final!
data_system_refresh_failed:
The Data System couldn't
refresh due to a error!
data_system_disabled_error:
The Data System is currently disabled due
to an error or has been
disabled manually. Please refresh using the
"Refresh Data System"
button for the system to refresh then try again.
data_system_password_correct_fail: Server-Pasword correction failed! Check the console!
data_system_password_update_fail: Failed to update password! Check the console!
Automatically unmounts the mod when the: Automatically unmounts the mod when the game is closed
Makes the buttons play sound effects: Makes the buttons play sound effects
Makes cubes rain in the background: Makes cubes rain in the background
Set a password for your P2MM server, thi: Set a password for your P2MM server, this can be changed while the server is up but a level restart is required
Have your server display public on steam: Have your server display public on steam servers?
Type any custom launch options you want. Example (+map 'mapname').
If You See This Something Is Wrong: If You See This Something Is Wrong
Makes the mod's files mount from src/Mod: Makes the mod's files mount from src/ModFiles
Manually overide if the server will oper: Manually overide if the server will operate next play session.
Its recommended to also set Public Serve: Its recommended to also set Public Server to false to have your server not on the Steam Servers
Those with your IP Address will still be: Those with your IP Address will still be able to join. Set a password if you want a private server.
Leave this to default if you don't know: Leave this to default if you don't know what it does!
(only use for public games) may break so: (only use for public games) may break some functionality
only enable this if you know what you're: only enable this if you know what you're doing!
Disabling this can cause your next play: Disabling this can cause your next play session to act weird. Leave on if you don't know what it does!
